text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Seeing as it's my day off, I decide to<n>head out and do some
shopping.<n>While at the mall, I spot Tamamo<n>Cross,
standing still as if in a trance.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: T-T-T-Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Right on time! For real, ya got agift there! Seriously! I can't thankya enough for comin' all this way!
choice_data_list: W-we didn't have plans today... did we?
W-we didn't have plans today... did we?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
No, but your timin' couldn't be more<n>perfect! I'm in a real
bind, ya see!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Look at all these fancy-schmancy<n>stores! How da heck am I
s'posed to<n>know which one to shop in?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But look—I NEED a present for my<n>parents' wedding
anniversary! So<n>please, Trainer, ya gotta help me!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
My siblings are makin' our folks<n>okonomiyaki to celebrate,
but I can't<n>help since I'm here. That's why I<n>thought I'd
get 'em a present instead.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I don't got the cash for anything too<n>crazy, but... ya got any
ideas?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The "fancy" stores she mentioned<n>would typically be
considered pretty<n>easy on a student's wallet. So if<n>those
are outside the budget...
choice_data_list: How about getting them a box of chocolates?
How about getting them a box of chocolates?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Many budget-friendly chocolate<n>brands look just as
beautiful as the<n>high-end stuff, and getting a box of<n>
chocolates still feels like an occasion.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I should have enough moneyfor somethin' that looks fancy!Plus the kids would never say no to candy... Sounds like a plan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that decision made, Tamamo<n>Cross and I make our
way to the<n>sweets shops.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
N-no way... Please tell me they forgot<n>to put a decimal point
in this price<n>somewhere...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I could buy five big boxes ofregular chocolates for the price of thisone piece of chocolate!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Who in their right mind would spendtheir entire snack budget on onepiece of chocolate... WHO?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I don't believe it... I don't! Do people<n>eat this pricey stuff on
the regular?
choice_data_list: Most people save it for special occasions.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain that such luxurious treats<n>are usually saved for
presents to<n>others, or for when you really want to<n>treat
yourself.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Treat yourself?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I've heard of the concept, but...<n>people actually do it? Why?
If you<n>have that much extra cash, shouldn't<n>ya save it? I
don't get it...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
But seriously, these prices... What's<n>even a good deal? Do
deals even<n>exist here?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Good idea. I don't wanna jump into a<n>decision with this
kinda money on the<n>line.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Phew... I feel like I can breatheagain. Now, what should I get?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Since when are pancakes so pricey?<n>I've gotta buy a
present for my folks,<n>so I can't spend that much here.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'll just have a glass of water! I'm<n>not that hungry anyway.

text_block_list.name: Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, are you ready to order?
choice_data_list: Two pancake sets with juice please.

text_block_list.name: Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text: Thank you. We'll have that out for<n>you in a moment.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hey! Why'd you order for me?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross and I have been<n>working hard on and off
the track. So I<n>tell her that I believe we deserve a<n>reward,
which is why I'm treating her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Of course, it's not just a reward.<n>These pancakes will also
motivate us<n>to do our best in our upcoming<n>practices and
races.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
...I see what you're tryin' to do. You<n>want me to experience
this whole<n>"treatin' yaself" thing, right?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I still don't get what the fuss is 'bout,<n>but... well, guess it's
too late to say<n>no. Let's see what the hype's about!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... 'Sides, I'd have to be crazy to<n>turn down a free
meal of bougie<n>pancakes!

text_block_list.name: Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for waiting. Here's your<n>pancakes and juice.
Enjoy your<n>meal!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It's 'bout time! These things sure are<n>fluffy. Let's see...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ...Mmph?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
(The richness that only eggs can<n>provide is filling my mouth!
No, wait,<n>it's fadin' into somethin' else...)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
(It's the whipped cream! It goes so<n>well with the saltiness
of the butter...<n>And the aftertaste is so light! I wanna<n>eat
moooore!)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: DEEE-LISSSHHH!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Trainer, it's so good!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I definitely get wantin' to eat like thismore often, even if it is tough onthe wallet.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I guess there is somethin' to this<n>whole treatin' yaself
thing.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Still... I wish my family was here to<n>taste these pancakes
with me. The<n>squirts and my parents deserve a<n>treat too,
yeah?
choice_data_list:
I bet that's how your family feels about you,
though.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If her family is anything like Tamamo<n>Cross, surely they
want to see her<n>thrive out here, eating delicious food<n>and
treating herself when she works<n>hard.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
They'd feel the same way 'bout me?<n>Now that ya mention
it...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross's Brother
text_block_list.text:
Hey! How come Tama gets an extra<n>croquette and we
don't?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross's Father
text_block_list.text:
Well, your sister took first place in the<n>race, didn't she? She
deserves a<n>reward! Tama, eat up and recharge<n>for your
next race!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: You're right... My folks were treatin'<n>me all the time...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Which makes sense... Of course they<n>want me to be happy.
Geez... why<n>didn't I realize it sooner?
choice_data_list: Maybe it'd be okay to treat yourself more?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Well... This feels like more than<n>enough for me, but I'll think
about it.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I better get back to these<n>pancakes! I'm not
leavin' a single<n>crumb!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Newly free from the guilt of enjoying<n>her fluffy treat,
Tamamo Cross dives<n>in with renewed vigor.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Look, I want to finish these pancakes.I want to savor every bite! ButI'm... I'm reachin' my limit... I needaslow down.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
No, it's just so rich—not just in flavor,<n>but in price... I know
you're treatin'<n>me, but I can feel the money flyin'<n>away.
I'm gettin' chills...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sounds like she doesn't have much<n>tolerance for high-end
dining—even if<n>we're just at a cafe. Still, she makes<n>sure
to finish every last crumb of<n>pancake.
